subject: Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. rescinded one of Kendrick Perkins’s technical fouls — clearing him to play Friday against Orlando — and the Celtics’ attention turned to the availability of their injured players.
snippet: The N.B.A. rescinded one of Kendrick Perkins’s technical fouls — clearing him to play Friday against Orlando — and the Celtics’ attention turned to the availability of their injured players.
